website_summaries.verdict: This beautiful, hand-carved Himalayan massage stone is shaped like a heart and proven tor reduce stress and tension in muscles.
pros: Intended to help reduce stress, tension, and loosen sore muscles when heated
Can be heated using any dry heating source
Stays warm for a good amount of time
cons: A few have said their stone came damaged

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Cutest salt rock hearts! So disappointing! I bought these in April and they were gorgeous! Just like the picture. The ones I got this week are tiny, hardly look like hearts and are almost white salt.
customer_reviews.author: Glynda J Laing

customer_reviews.title: The most disgusting product I’ve ever received from amazon!
customer_reviews.text: So gross! Mine has multiple hairs inside the plastic wrap! And the shape of it was nothing like the pictures. Disgusting!
customer_reviews.author: Little Miss Loving

customer_reviews.title: motion
customer_reviews.text: This is something I should have gotten along time ago to help me with my neck,shoulder and arm pain.It is more cracked as well as rougher ,then I had hoped.But does not seem to bother it or me so that is good
customer_reviews.author: paprj

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: This item is beautiful. Had to request replacement as original damaged. After sending several pictures, the seller was convinced I was telling the truth about the damage to the item. Kind of surprised that I was made to give so much proof. But issue resolved and I love the item.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then other pictures in reviews
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of them and only one of them didn’t get chipped in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Busy parents shop online

customer_reviews.title: Love this stone
customer_reviews.text: Love this stone, it is my first so I can not say how it does in comparison to other Himalayan salt rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Beekeeper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these because of their shape making them versatile during massages.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic, purchase them for my massage therapist as a ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic, purchase them for my massage therapist as a gift. She uses It for her stone therapy treatment amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe yours will look better
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't a heart shape at all more like just a pink rock.
customer_reviews.author: Angel DeM

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I love those cute salt rock hearts. I warmed one up and put it on my tensed and cold skin and found relief. They are the size of the palm of a hand and would be a great gift but I think I will keep all 3 for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive a heart, but a broken cylinder shape.
customer_reviews.author: debcooks

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Love my stones, great fit on my palms. Rounded edges work well on the plantar area of feet, and great on neck. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to one of my friends as a gift and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product but make sure you purchase or have some sandpaper because these come pretty rough. I bought seven and most were chipped and one was much smaller than the others.
customer_reviews.author: The Natster

customer_reviews.title: Good, cheap salt rock for massage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after getting a hot salt rock massage done professionally. This is basically the same type of rock and it works just as well. At first, I wasn't crazy about the shape (ones used on me professionally were shaped like a Dove bar of soap) but I realize it actually works to your advantage and allows you to get a grip on it while you use it. The only thing I would say about it is that it was a little rough fresh out of the box, so if you decide to get one I would highly recommend using either a nail file or very light sandpaper to smooth it out a bit before using it.
customer_reviews.author: FJK1138

customer_reviews.title: I'm highly disappointed in the stone that was sent to me
customer_reviews.text: I'm highly disappointed in the stone that was sent to me. Why is there a big chunk missing as if it was dropped. I wanted a smooth stone that I could rub over my body but this stone is unsightly with ragged edges from the chunk that's missing. The price is super, but I am not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t look like the box and was open on both sides
customer_reviews.text: Just looking at it, it doesn’t look like the box and it was open on both sides when I opened the box. But I haven’t used it yet. Will edit the rating once I use it and see the results
customer_reviews.author: Micala King

customer_reviews.title: A Solid Image of Love
customer_reviews.text: While I bought this as a gift, I also plan to order one for myself. So I haven't tried it out, but when I order another one, I will. I expect that I will be happy with it. Even just hold it in one's hand and it's comforting.
customer_reviews.author: Cecile A.

customer_reviews.title: Great add-on Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than I thought it would be. Great for hot stone massages! There is a course side and a smooth side which provides versatility. I have even been using mine as an exfoliate!
customer_reviews.author: Connie catron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for massage.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for massage. Stays warm for a good amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Anony

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Price was right. Multiple ordered. I put in Freezer and use as cold compress.
customer_reviews.author: DMoor

customer_reviews.title: Great stone!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. I use it on wood burner stove to heat up a bit (don’t want to crack it) and use it on right calf/ankle muscles. Very soothing - great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mickey D

customer_reviews.title: Nice size stone
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by the size of this stone. Fits the hand well. Smooth surface.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: amazing! I absolutely love it, holds heat well. Came in great condition. Smooth surface great color!
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: purchased 4 and one needed to be replaced.  Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are easy to hold and heat up well in toaster oven.
customer_reviews.author: ellebeauz

customer_reviews.title: Always buy two, because when you’re using yours someone else will want to use it 👏
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Moms warmer and she LOVES it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these stones! Great shape and perfect size! Came wrapped well as well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Adams

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: This felt amazing. I am a true believer in the power of the himalayan salt
customer_reviews.author: A.C

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased this
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my massage clients and get a lot of positive feedback
customer_reviews.author: Moonstone

product_meta.title: Pure Himalayan Salt Works Heart Massage Stone, Pink Crystal Hand-Carved Stone for Massage Therapy, Deodorant and Salt and Sugar Scrubs, 2.75” W x 3” H x 1.5” D
product_meta.description: Pure Himalayan Salt Works Massage Stone is 100% authentic and produced in the largest stretch of the Himalayan mountains known for its infamous pink salt. Massage Stone is hand-carved to use in a variety of spa services. Use heated to help reduce stress, tension and loosen sore muscles. Use frozen to help alleviate pain. Use wet as a deodorant bar. Also excellent for use with salt and sugar scrubs. Please note: Size, weight and color may vary due to the nature of rock.
feature_bullets: 100% authentic and produced in the largest stretch of the Himalayan mountains known for its infamous pink salt
Hand-carved to use in a variety of spa services
Use heated to help reduce stress, tension and loosen sore muscles. Use frozen to help alleviate pain.
Can be used wet as a deodorant bar and with salt and sugar scrubs
